create or replace PACKAGE lm_cst_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table lm_capacity_sets
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:09)

-- Generated global constants

g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'LM_CAPACITY_SETS';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION cst_select_row( i_cst_ID   IN  lm_capacity_sets.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_cst   OUT lm_capacity_sets%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION cst_select_row_uk1( i_cst_NAME   IN  lm_capacity_sets.NAME%TYPE
                           , o_rt_cst  OUT lm_capacity_sets%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION cst_select_row_uk2( i_cst_DESCRIPTION   IN  lm_capacity_sets.DESCRIPTION%TYPE
                           , o_rt_cst  OUT lm_capacity_sets%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                           , o_rt_cst   OUT lm_capacity_sets%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION cst_select_row_upd_uk1( i_cst_NAME   IN  lm_capacity_sets.NAME%TYPE
                               , o_rt_cst  OUT lm_capacity_sets%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION cst_select_row_upd_uk2( i_cst_DESCRIPTION   IN  lm_capacity_sets.DESCRIPTION%TYPE
                               , o_rt_cst  OUT lm_capacity_sets%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE cst_lock_row( i_cst_ID   IN  lm_capacity_sets.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE cst_lock_row_nowait( i_cst_ID   IN  lm_capacity_sets.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE cst_insert_row ( io_rt_cst  IN OUT lm_capacity_sets%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION cst_update_row( i_cst_ID   IN     lm_capacity_sets.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_cst  IN OUT lm_capacity_sets%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION cst_delete_row( i_cst_ID   IN  lm_capacity_sets.ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;


END lm_cst_tapi_pck;
/




package body lm_cst_tapi_pck

function cst_select_row( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type
                       , o_rt_cst   out lm_capacity_sets%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_cst ( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_capacity_sets cst
            where cst.id = i_cst_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_cst( i_cst_id => i_cst_id );
         fetch c_cst into o_rt_cst;
         l_found := c_cst%found;
         close c_cst;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_cst%isopen
         then
            close c_cst;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end cst_select_row;

          where cst.name = i_cst_name ;

         open c_cst(i_cst_name => i_cst_name);
         fetch c_cst into o_rt_cst;
         l_found := c_cst%found;
         close c_cst;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_cst%isopen
      then
         close c_cst;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end cst_select_row_uk1;

function cst_select_row_upd( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type
                           , o_rt_cst   out lm_capacity_sets%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_cst ( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_capacity_sets cst
            where cst.id = i_cst_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_cst( i_cst_id => i_cst_id );
   fetch c_cst into o_rt_cst;
   l_found := c_cst%found;
   close c_cst;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_cst%isopen
      then
         close c_cst;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end cst_select_row_upd;

function cst_select_row_upd_uk1( i_cst_name   in  lm_capacity_sets.name%type
                               , o_rt_cst  out lm_capacity_sets%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := cst_select_row_uk1( i_cst_name   =>  i_cst_name
                                   , o_rt_cst => o_rt_cst );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := cst_select_row_upd( i_cst_id => o_rt_cst.id
                                      , o_rt_cst => o_rt_cst );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end cst_select_row_upd_uk1;

                                      , o_rt_cst => o_rt_cst );

procedure cst_lock_row( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_cst ( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_capacity_sets cst
              where cst.id = i_cst_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_cst_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                cst_lock_row_nowait( i_cst_id => i_cst_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_cst( i_cst_id => i_cst_id );
                  close c_cst;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_cst%isopen
         then
            close c_cst;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end cst_lock_row;

procedure cst_lock_row_nowait( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_cst ( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_capacity_sets cst
               where cst.id = i_cst_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_cst_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_cst( i_cst_id => i_cst_id );

            close c_cst;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_cst%isopen
        then
           close c_cst;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_cst_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end cst_lock_row_nowait;

function cst_perform_update( i_cst_id   in     lm_capacity_sets.id%type
                           , io_rt_cst  in out lm_capacity_sets%rowtype )
return number
;

function cst_perform_delete( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure cst_insert_row ( io_rt_cst  in out lm_capacity_sets%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_capacity_sets( id
                                , name
                                , description
                                , ind_factory_default_set
                                , active )
              values ( io_rt_cst.id
                     , io_rt_cst.name
                     , io_rt_cst.description
                     , io_rt_cst.ind_factory_default_set
                     , io_rt_cst.active )
           returning id
                   , name
                   , description
                   , ind_factory_default_set
                   , active
                into io_rt_cst.id
                   , io_rt_cst.name
                   , io_rt_cst.description
                   , io_rt_cst.ind_factory_default_set
                   , io_rt_cst.active;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_cst.id||'"'
                                                             ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_cst.name||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_cst.description||'"'
                                                             ||', IND_FACTORY_DEFAULT_SET = "'||io_rt_cst.ind_factory_default_set||'"'
                                                             ||', ACTIVE = "'||io_rt_cst.active||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end cst_insert_row;

function cst_perform_update( i_cst_id   in     lm_capacity_sets.id%type
                           , io_rt_cst  in out lm_capacity_sets%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_capacity_sets
            set id = io_rt_cst.id
              , name = io_rt_cst.name
              , description = io_rt_cst.description
              , ind_factory_default_set = io_rt_cst.ind_factory_default_set
              , active = io_rt_cst.active
          where id = i_cst_id
      returning id
              , name
              , description
              , ind_factory_default_set
              , active
           into io_rt_cst.id
              , io_rt_cst.name
              , io_rt_cst.description
              , io_rt_cst.ind_factory_default_set
              , io_rt_cst.active;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_cst.id||'"'
                                                             ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_cst.name||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_cst.description||'"'
                                                             ||', IND_FACTORY_DEFAULT_SET = "'||io_rt_cst.ind_factory_default_set||'"'
                                                             ||', ACTIVE = "'||io_rt_cst.active||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end cst_perform_update;

function cst_perform_delete( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_capacity_sets
          where id = i_cst_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_cst_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end cst_perform_delete;

function cst_update_row( i_cst_id   in     lm_capacity_sets.id%type
                       , io_rt_cst  in out lm_capacity_sets%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         cst_lock_row( i_cst_id   =>  i_cst_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            cst_perform_update( i_cst_id   =>  i_cst_id
                              , io_rt_cst  => io_rt_cst );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_cst.id||'"'
                                                          ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_cst.name||'"'
                                                          ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_cst.description||'"'
                                                          ||', IND_FACTORY_DEFAULT_SET = "'||io_rt_cst.ind_factory_default_set||'"'
                                                          ||', ACTIVE = "'||io_rt_cst.active||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end cst_update_row;

function cst_delete_row( i_cst_id   in  lm_capacity_sets.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.cst_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         cst_lock_row( i_cst_id   =>  i_cst_id );

         
         l_deleted := cst_perform_delete( i_cst_id   =>  i_cst_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_cst_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end cst_delete_row;


end lm_cst_tapi_pck;
/
